text: Margot Robbie is a married woman — that ’ s our takeaway from her latest Instagram. As rumors swirled that she married Tom Ackerley in a super secret wedding in her native Australia, the Suicide Squad and The Wolf of Wall Street actress, 26, took to the photo - sharing site to post a photo of herself flashing a pear - shaped diamond ring on that finger while she kissed the director in the background. It was a no caption provided, no caption needed kind of post. While there is a lot of speculation, not much is really known about the nuptials. It was was said that the Aussie actress landed at the Gold Coast Airport in Queensland wearing a “ I Do Down Under ” T - shirt. The wedding reportedly took place in Byron Bay.
